title: Embracing Change in the Creative Process | TEDxRVA
description:
Lindsay Ellyn and Taylor Alexander are Nashville singer-songwriters. They discuss what they learned when they changed their creative process by collaborating and co-writing a song together.


This talk was given at a local TEDx event, produced independently of the TED Conferences. It was filmed and edited by Tijo Media at the Carpenter Theatre at Dominion Arts Center in Richmond, VA.
author: Lindsay Ellyn, Taylor Alexander
